pages.text: The $(mob)Spectre$() is a monster that spawns in dark places in the $(thing)Overworld$(), including the surface at night. They attack players on sight by approaching them and striking them once in melee, disappearing immediately afterwards. Although a $(mob)Spectre's$() melee attack deals no damage it bestows a curse on one enchantable item carried by the target, including items worn. Wearing a $(item)Witch Hat$() prevents these curses from being bestowed.
